problem_names: lemma owhile_unfold: "owhile C B r s = ocondition (C r) (B r |>> owhile C B) (oreturn r) s"

lemma ovalidNF_owhile:
  assumes "\<And>s. P r s \<Longrightarrow> I r s"
    and "\<And>r s. ovalidNF (\<lambda>s'. I r s' \<and> C r s' \<and> s' = s) (B r) (\<lambda>r' s'. I r' s' \<and> (r', r) \<in> R)"
    and "wf R"
    and "\<And>r s. I r s \<Longrightarrow> \<not> C r s \<Longrightarrow> Q r s"
  shows "ovalidNF (P r) (OptionMonad.owhile C B r) Q"

lemma ovalidNF_owhile_inv[wp]:
  assumes "\<And>r s. ovalidNF (\<lambda>s'. I r s' \<and> C r s' \<and> s' = s) (B r) (\<lambda>r' s'. I r' s' \<and> (r', r) \<in> R)"
    and "wf R"
    and "\<And>r s. I r s \<Longrightarrow> \<not> C r s \<Longrightarrow> Q r s"
  shows "ovalidNF (I r) (owhile_inv C B r I R) Q"
translations: lemma owhile_unfold: "owhile C B r s = ocondition (C r) (B r |>> owhile C B) (oreturn r) s"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. owhile C B r s = ocondition (C r) (B r |>> owhile C B) (oreturn r) s
by (auto simp: ocondition_def obind_def oreturn_def owhile_def option_while_simps split: option.split)

lemma ovalidNF_owhile:
  assumes "\<And>s. P r s \<Longrightarrow> I r s"
    and "\<And>r s. ovalidNF (\<lambda>s'. I r s' \<and> C r s' \<and> s' = s) (B r) (\<lambda>r' s'. I r' s' \<and> (r', r) \<in> R)"
    and "wf R"
    and "\<And>r s. I r s \<Longrightarrow> \<not> C r s \<Longrightarrow> Q r s"
  shows "ovalidNF (P r) (OptionMonad.owhile C B r) Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ovalidNF (P r) (owhile C B r) Q
unfolding ovalidNF_def

 1. \<forall>s.

       (\<forall>ra. owhile C B r s = Some ra \<longrightarrow> Q ra s)

using this:

proof (chain)
picking this:
  I r s
  wf R
  \<lbrakk>I ?r s; C ?r s; B ?r s = Some ?r'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?r', ?r) \<in> R
  \<lbrakk>I ?r s; C ?r s; B ?r s = Some ?r'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> I ?r' s
  \<lbrakk>I ?r s; C ?r s; B ?r s = None\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> None \<noteq> None \<and>
                    (\<forall>r'. None = Some r' \<longrightarrow> Q r' s)
  \<lbrakk>I ?r1 s; \<not> C ?r1 s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> Some ?r1 \<noteq> None \<and>
                    (\<forall>r'.
                        Some ?r1 = Some r' \<longrightarrow> Q r' s)
show "owhile C B r s \<noteq> None \<and> (\<forall>r'. owhile C B r s = Some r' \<longrightarrow> Q r' s)"

using this:
  I r s
  wf R
  \<lbrakk>I ?r s; C ?r s; B ?r s = Some ?r'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?r', ?r) \<in> R
  \<lbrakk>I ?r s; C ?r s; B ?r s = Some ?r'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> I ?r' s
  \<lbrakk>I ?r s; C ?r s; B ?r s = None\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> None \<noteq> None \<and>
                    (\<forall>r'. None = Some r' \<longrightarrow> Q r' s)
  \<lbrakk>I ?r1 s; \<not> C ?r1 s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> Some ?r1 \<noteq> None \<and>
                    (\<forall>r'.
                        Some ?r1 = Some r' \<longrightarrow> Q r' s)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. owhile C B r s \<noteq> None \<and>
    (\<forall>r'. owhile C B r s = Some r' \<longrightarrow> Q r' s)
by (rule owhile_rule[where I=I])

lemma ovalidNF_owhile_inv[wp]:
  assumes "\<And>r s. ovalidNF (\<lambda>s'. I r s' \<and> C r s' \<and> s' = s) (B r) (\<lambda>r' s'. I r' s' \<and> (r', r) \<in> R)"
    and "wf R"
    and "\<And>r s. I r s \<Longrightarrow> \<not> C r s \<Longrightarrow> Q r s"
  shows "ovalidNF (I r) (owhile_inv C B r I R) Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ovalidNF (I r) (AutoCorres_Misc.owhile_inv C B r I R) Q
unfolding owhile_inv_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ovalidNF (I r) (owhile C B r) Q
using _ assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  PROP ?psi \<Longrightarrow> PROP ?psi
  ovalidNF (\<lambda>s'. I ?r s' \<and> C ?r s' \<and> s' = ?s) (B ?r)
   (\<lambda>r' s'. I r' s' \<and> (r', ?r) \<in> R)
  wf R
  \<lbrakk>I ?r ?s; \<not> C ?r ?s\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> Q ?r ?s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ovalidNF (I r) (owhile C B r) Q
by (rule ovalidNF_owhile)
end
